body_html: I'm aware of workarounds, but the code we are using is pip install -r requirements.txt and will be nice to make it work in all the environments, not fan of creating several requirements.txt per operating system, Python version, etc.
body_text: I'm aware of workarounds, but the code we are using is pip install -r requirements.txt and will be nice to make it work in all the environments, not fan of creating several requirements.txt per operating system, Python version, etc.
body: I'm aware of workarounds, but the code we are using is `pip install -r requirements.txt` and will be nice to make it work in all the environments, not fan of creating several requirements.txt per operating system, Python version, etc.
